# wixarikaRt

**wixarikaRt** provides a collection of color palettes inspired by the
art, culture, and symbolism of the Wixarika people (Wixaritari in
plural), and other Indigenous peoples of Mexico.

![Wixarika art and
culture](https://media.istockphoto.com/id/185231941/es/foto/huichol-de-artesan%C3%ADas.jpg?s=612x612&w=0&k=20&c=4ZcsWRZuYGS_jIXlAsAow8We-TEUWHrF2PZqiwZGJgA=)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## About the Wixarika People

Wixarika *\[viˈʐaɾika\]~\[viˈraɾika\]* means *“a person with a deep
heart who loves knowledge”*. They are also miscalled *huicholes*, which
means *“the one who flees”*.

The Wixaritari live mostly in the mountain range within the states of
Jalisco, Nayarit, Durango, Zacatecas, and San Luis Potosí.

![Wixarika
people](https://revistacuartoscuro.com/admin/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/La-piel-de-Wirikuta-022.jpg)

*Photo: Christian Palma - Revista Cuarto Oscuro*

### Learn More About Wixarika Culture

**Academic Resources:**

- [The Huichol Indians: A pre-Columbian culture in Mexico today
  (1979)](https://unesdoc.unesco.org/ark:/48223/pf0000044064.locale=es) -
  UNESCO (en, es, fr)
- [Wixarika, un pueblo en
  comunicación](https://dgeiib.basica.sep.gob.mx/files/fondo-editorial/educacion-intercultural/cgeib_00079.pdf) -
  SEP México (es)
- [Historia, patrimonio y legado de la cultura
  wixarika](https://elpais.com/mexico/2025-07-15/historia-patrimonio-y-legado-de-la-cultura-wixarika-la-unica-tradicion-indigena-viva-en-la-lista-del-patrimonio-mundial-de-la-unesco.htm) -
  El País (es)
- [A Sacred Peyote Ceremony, and a Clash Over COVID-19
  Safety](https://www.nytimes.com/2021/07/05/travel/mexico-peyote-pilgrimage.html) -
  New York Times (en)

**Websites:**

- [Wixarika.org](https://www.wixarika.org/) (en, es)

**Documentaries:**

- [Eco de la Montaña](https://youtu.be/8v5Ho8RPQ78)
- [Huicholes: The Last Peyote Guardians](https://huicholesfilm.com/en/)

### Support Wixarika Communities

Consider donating to organizations working with the Wixaritari:

- [Casa Huichol](https://casahuichol.com/)
- [Wixarika.org](https://www.wixarika.org/)
- [Yurienaka
  Parewiwame](https://app.fgfunnels.com/v2/preview/SwaS84NONFzGeCF9dgUk)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Installation

You can install the development version of **wixarikaRt** from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("woomora/wixarikaRt")
```

## Citation

If you use **wixarikaRt** in your research or publications, please cite:

``` r
citation("wixarikaRt")
```

## Acknowledgments

This package is created with deep respect for the Wixarika people and
other Indigenous peoples of Mexico. The color palettes are inspired by
traditional art and cultural symbolism, but are not direct reproductions
of sacred or ceremonial designs.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`scale_color_wixarika()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/scale_wixarika.md)
  [`scale_colour_wixarika()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/scale_wixarika.md)
  [`scale_fill_wixarika()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/scale_wixarika.md)
  : Wixarika Color Scales for ggplot2
- [`wixarika_pal()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_pal.md)
  : Get a Wixarika Palette
- [`wixarika_pal_info()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_pal_info.md)
  : Print Wixarika Palette Information
- [`wixarika_pal_names()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_pal_names.md)
  : List Available Wixarika Palettes
- [`wixarika_palettes`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_palettes.md)
  [`wixarika_palette_info`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_palettes.md)
  : WixarikaRt Color Palettes
- [`wixarika_show_all()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_show_all.md)
  : Display All Wixarika Palettes
- [`wixarika_show_pal()`](https://woomora.github.io/wixarikaRt/reference/wixarika_show_pal.md)
  : Display a Wixarika Palette
